item.title: Bulletin updated at 12:31 HKT 28/08/2023
item.description:
At noon at the Hong Kong Observatory :
Air temperature : 31 degrees Celsius
Relative Humidity : 77 per cent
During the past hour the mean UV Index recorded at King's Park : 6
Intensity of UV radiation : high

According to the present forecast track, Tropical Cyclone Saola will enter within 800 kilometres of Hong Kong later on Wednesday (30 August). As Tropical Cyclone Haikui located to the east of Saola may further develop and interact with Saola, the uncertainty in the subsequent movement of Saola is relatively high. Depending on the size of circulation of Saola and its distance from the Pearl River Estuary, the Observatory will assess the need for issuing Tropical Cyclone Warning Signals in the middle to latter parts of this week. Members of the public please take note of the latest weather forecast.

Hot weather might cause adverse health effects. The public should stay on the alert and drink more water.
